sentences.en: A nobleman ranking below a duke and above an earl a count.
sentences.cn: 等级在侯爵之下、子爵之上的英国贵族.

sentences.en: A nobleman ranking below a duke and above an earl or a count.
sentences.cn: 侯爵位于公爵之下,子爵或男爵之上的贵族地位.

sentences.en: Although his grandfather was a nobleman, he was very poor.
sentences.cn: 尽管他的祖父是贵族, 他却非常穷困.

sentences.en: An Anglo - Saxon nobleman or prince, especially the heir to a throne.
sentences.cn: 盎格鲁 - 撒克逊贵族或王子, 尤指王室中的继承者.

sentences.en: Freud postulated that Moses was an Egyptian nobleman who adhered to the monotheism of Akhenaten.
sentences.cn: 弗洛伊德也相信摩西是在荒野上被刺杀,此后在犹太教徒的心中产生一种杀父罪疚感的集体意识.

sentences.en: He looked like a nobleman with his rich clothes.
sentences.cn: 他衣着华丽,看上去象个贵族.

sentences.en: He was discommoned by the nobleman, then the land was given to his brother.
sentences.cn: 他被贵族剥夺公地使用权, 然后把这块土地给他的弟弟.

sentences.en: I couldn't bear the girl to be seized and taken away by the nobleman.
sentences.cn: 我无法忍受让那贵族将女孩抢走.

sentences.en: It had once been the home of a wealthy nobleman.
sentences.cn: 这曾是一个有钱贵族的宅邸。

sentences.en: Marquis is a nobleman ranking below a duke and above an earl or a count.
sentences.cn: 侯爵是位于公爵之下,子爵或男爵之上的贵族地位.

sentences.en: On the sacred stone of Proving Ground, the nobleman faced the servant boy.
sentences.cn: 在角斗场神圣的石头之上, 这位贵族面对了这位仆人的男孩.

sentences.en: One of his friends was a young nobleman who was called Bassanio.
sentences.cn: 其中一位是名叫巴塞尼奥的年轻贵族.

sentences.en: The name of the nobleman? Lord Randolph Churchill.
sentences.cn: 这位贵族是谁 呢 ?伦道夫?丘吉尔勋爵.

sentences.en: The nobleman noticed it and asked him why.
sentences.cn: 贵族注意到了,问他为什么流泪.

sentences.en: When the nobleman's son saw his intended bride - to - be, it was love at first sight.
sentences.cn: 当那个贵族的儿子看见他的准新娘时, 可以说是一见钟情.

trans.tran_en: a man who is a member of the highest social class and has a title such as ‘Duke’
